org.jamsim.ascape.r

Class AscapeGD

  • java.lang.Object
    • GDInterface
      • org.jamsim.ascape.r.AscapeGD

  • public class AscapeGD
extends GDInterface
    An R graphics device in the Ascape Swing MDI. Make sure the environment variable JAVAGD_CLASS_NAME = "org/jamsim/ascape/r/AscapeGD". This can be set in the environment before running R, or from with R like so:

    Sys.setenv('JAVAGD_CLASS_NAME'='org/jamsim/ascape/r/AscapeGD')

    To create a window in R, make sure the package JavaGD is loaded, then execute "JavaGD()".
    Version:
    $Revision$
    Author:
    Oliver Mannion

      • storeLastCreatedAscapeGD

      • addToNavigator

        public void addToNavigator(java.lang.String path)
        Add this GD to the navigator. Exposed so can be called from R, after setName(String) has been called (from which we get a node title).
        Parameters:
        path - a path to a sub folder node, eg: "Base/Means" which represents the folder Means under the folder Base, or just "Base" which will add to the folder Base, or null or empty string to add directly under "Graphs".

      • selectNode

        public void selectNode()
        Select the Navigator node for this AscapeGD if it exists, otherwise exit silently.
